action.action-desc: Mr. Rice of South Carolina introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To provide for the withdrawal of normal trade relations treatment with the Russian Federation, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Defund Putin Act.

section.header: Withdrawal of normal trade relations treatment with the Russian Federation
section.text: Notwithstanding the provisions of title I of the Russia and Moldova Jackson-Vanik Repeal and Sergei Magnitsky Rule of Law Accountability Act of 2012 (Public Law 112â€“ 208; 19 U.S.C. 2434 note) or any other provision of law, effective on the date of the enactment of this Act normal trade relations treatment shall not apply pursuant to section 102 of that Act to the products of the Russian Federation.

section.header: Prohibition on importation of petroleum, natural gas, petrochemicals, and coal from the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, the President shall take such actions as may be necessary to prohibit the importation of petroleum, natural gas, petrochemicals, and coal from the Russian Federation and the Republic of Belarus.
The President shall promulgate such regulations as may be necessary and appropriate to carry out this section.
